titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012

bioghist.p: The Medico-Chirurgical College of Philadelphia was established in 1881, and offered a three year course of study.

scopecontent.p: This is a collection of records related to Medico-Chirurgical College of Philadelphia. Materials in the collection include: card files of alumni of the College, including graduates of the Medical College, 1882-1917, dental and pharmacy alumni, and Frankford Hospital Interns, 1914-1937; and reel-to-reel tapes related to the history of the College. Tapes relate to the period from 1848 to 1858. The collection also includes a mounted photograph of the 1903 graduating class of the College with a copy of the commencement program listing graduates. Some students have been identified.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.

relatedmaterial.p: Related material may be found in the following collections: Colege of Physicians of Philadelphia: Medico-Chirurgical College of Philadelphia, lists of students and graduates (Z 10a/10).
